option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Appcolegios"> <activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> </application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Appcolegios"> <!-- Pantalla de Splash como lanzador --> <activity android:name=".auth.SplashActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <!-- Auth activities --> <activity android:name=".auth.LoginActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".auth.RegisterActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".auth.ResetPasswordActivity" android:exported="false" /> <!-- Home --> <activity android:name=".ui.HomeActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ui.ProfileActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ui.GradesActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ui.AttendanceActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ui.TasksActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ui.CalendarActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ui.ScheduleActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ui.EventsActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".notificaciones.NotificationsActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".mensajes.ConversationsActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".mensajes.ChatActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".pagos.PaymentsActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".transporte.TransportActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".perfil.AcademicInfoActivity" android:exported="false" /> <!-- ...otros componentes existentes... --> </application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color> <color name="primary">#145DA0</color> <color name="primary_dark">#0E4B8A</color> <color name="secondary">#00B4D8</color> <color name="secondary_dark">#0090B3</color> <color name="background">#F5F9FF</color> <color name="error">#B00020</color> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.Appcolegios" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.NoActionBar"> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/primary</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/primary_dark</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/secondary</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/secondary_dark</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/white</item> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@color/primary_dark</item> <item name="android:navigationBarColor">@color/primary_dark</item> <item name="android:windowBackground">@color/background</item> </style> </resources>
